LANGUAGE.description: Button that indicates the current language of the program, represented by a flag

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_FULLSCREEN.description: Located in the upper right corner, enlarges the window across the entire screen

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_RESTORE.description: Same button as Fullscreen, restores the window to it's previous dimension

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_MINIMIZE.description: Located in the upper right corner, reduces the window to a small title and hide its contents

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_ABOUT.description: Located in the help menu, displays informations about the application

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: Tool for project management and task management

WORKSPACE_BOARD_CONNECT.message: デバイスでコネクトしてを選んでください

WORKSPACE_PROJECT_LIBRARY.message: プロジェクトライブラリ
WORKSPACE_PROJECT_LIBRARY.description: Button that opens a modal with all the projects, with a folder icon as pictogram

WORKSPACE_DISCONNECTED.message: ディスコネクトでした
WORKSPACE_DISCONNECTED.description: Status of a device that is not connected.

WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.message: これをエグジットしてもよろしいですか？
WORKSPACE_TOOLBAR_EXIT_QUESTION.description: Select if you are sure you want to exit

EXIT.description: A button with the text exit

CHAT_JOIN_CHANNEL.message: チャンネルに参加します
CHAT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Button uset to connect to a channel.

CHAT_NEW_CHANNEL.message: チャンネル名を入力します
CHAT_NEW_CHANNEL.description: The name of the new channel

CHAT_TYPE_MESSAGE.message: メッセージをタイプします

CHAT_WELCOME_ADD_CHANNEL.message: 新しいチャンネルを足します
CHAT_WELCOME_ADD_CHANNEL.description: Text used when the user wants to add a new channel

CHAT_TITLE_WARNING.description: Title of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.message: Are you sure you want to part this channel?
CHAT_TEXT_PART_CHANNEL.description: Text of prompt that show up when the user wants to leave a channel.

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.message: チャンネル名を入力してください！
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Warning when the user didn't choose a channel name.

CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.message: メッセージをタイプしてください！
CHAT_INSERT_CHANNEL_MESSAGE.description: Notification text when the user didn't write a message.

CHAT_LOGIN_TITLE.description: Text when the user is connecting to a server.

CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.message: Your nickname is already in use. It has been changed to {nickName}
CHAT_TAKEN_NAME.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user tries to use a nickname already taken.

CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.message: This channel could not be joined! Please pick another one!
CHAT_COULD_NOT_JOIN_CHANNEL.description: Text of notification that shows up when the user can not connect to a certain channel

PROJECT_DASHBOARD.description: The Dashboard tab, used to send signals from a board.

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_INVALID_SIGNAL.description: Warning that shows up when the signal name entered by the user is not correct.

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_MOVE_LEFT.description: Button used to move a graph to the left

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_MOVE_RIGHT.description: Button used to move a graph to the right

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_GRAPH_SETTINGS.description: Button that opens a prompt where the user can modify the graph's properties

DASHBOARD_VIEWER_ERASE_GRAPH.description: Button used to delete a graph

TOOLBAR_RESISTOR_COLOR_CODE.description: Option in the Help Menu which opens a dialog that makes a connection between the color of a resistor and it's value

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_FROM_COLOR_TO_NUMBER.description: Options that transforms the color in a value

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_FROM_NUMBER_TO_COLOR.description: Option that transforms the value in a color

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_STRIPES.description: Number of stripes in the resistor

RESISTOR_COLORCODE_RESISTANCE.description: Label for the value of the resistance

PROJECT_NOTEBOOK.description: The Notebook Tab, where the user can take it's own notes

NOTEBOOK_SELECT_IMAGE_ERROR.message: 画像を選んでください。
NOTEBOOK_SELECT_IMAGE_ERROR.description: Notification error that shows up when the user didn't choose an image to load

NOTEBOOK_SELECT_FILE_ERROR.message: 有効な画像を選んでください。
NOTEBOOK_SELECT_FILE_ERROR.description: Notification error that shows up when the user didn't choose a file to load

PROJECT_DELETE_FOLDER.description: Delete a folder within a project

PROJECT_RENAME_FOLDER.description: Rename a folder within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FOLDER.description: Create a folder within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FOLDER_NAME.description: Label for the new name of the folder

PROJECT_DELETE_FILE.description: Delete a file within a project

PROJECT_RENAME_FILE.description: Rename a file within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FILE.description: Create a file within a project

PROJECT_NEW_FILE_NAME.description: Label for the new name of the file

PROJECT_SHOW_CODE.description: Button designed to show the code behind a blockly

PROJECT_HIDE_CONSOLE.message: コンソールを隠します
PROJECT_HIDE_CONSOLE.description: Button designed to hide the console

PROJECT_WELCOME_CREATE_NEW_APP.message: 新しいアプリケーションを作ります
PROJECT_WELCOME_CREATE_NEW_APP.description: Button to create a new project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_RENAME.description: Rename a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_DELETE.description: Delete a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_CLONE.description: Clone a project within the workspace

PROJECT_LIBRARY_IMPORT.description: Import a project from an archive

PROJECT_LIBRARY_EXPORT.description: Export a project from the workspace

SCHEMATICS.description: The Schematics Tab, used to load a circuit diagram

ADD_SCHEMATIC.description: Button used to add a schematics

DELETE_SCHEMATIC.description: Button used to delete a schematics

DELETE_MESSAGE.message: これを削除してもよろしいですか？

DELETE_CONFIRMATION.description: The message that appears when there is no picture
